title: Von Miller on joining Bills, gambling in Josh Allen’s man cave, trash-talking Tom Brady
itunes:title: Von Miller on joining Bills, gambling in Josh Allen’s man cave, trash-talking Tom Brady
description:
Buffalo Bills linebacker Von Miller joins Mike to discuss his time in Los Angeles, playing with Aaron Donald, the tough decision to leave the Super Bowl champion Rams, his infamous Halloween party in Denver, hanging out in Josh Allen's man cave, and why he should have never talked trash to Tom Brady. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
